description:
She is an American idol superstar and is shown as someone with amazing strength and is well-known through her singing/dancing career as well as a professional wrestler.
Her Jingu is an internal type named "Inverse". Its ability is to "reverse" situations at his/her will and her ability is not limited to reversing forces but could even reverse the will of her opponents.
Originally a male character who can use his/her Jingu`s "Inverse" ability is to change gender and physical appearance .
name: Syria Ootsuka
